title: syld JSON Report
description: Schema for the JSON report produced by `syld report --format json`, containing a timestamped inventory of installed packages and their license information.

scan_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 / RFC 3339 timestamp of when the scan was performed.

total_packages.description: Total number of packages included in the report.

total_projects.description: Number of distinct upstream project groups identified (packages with a project URL).

packages_without_url.description: Number of packages that have no upstream project URL.

projects_with_contributions.description: Number of projects that have at least one contribution opportunity.

total_contribution_opportunities.description: Total number of contribution opportunities across all projects.

projects.description: Upstream project groups, with related projects merged under common URL ancestors.

packages.description: List of installed packages discovered during the scan.

project.title: ProjectGroup
project.description: A group of related upstream projects, possibly merged under a common URL ancestor.

url.description: The grouping URL â€” either an exact project URL or a common ancestor prefix.

project_urls.description: Individual project URLs within an ancestor group. Empty for single-project groups.

package_names.description: Names of all packages belonging to this project group.

funding.description: Funding channels for this project. Omitted when empty.

is_open_source.description: Whether the project is open source (resolved from license analysis). Null if unknown.

documentation_url.description: URL to the project's documentation, or null if unavailable.

good_first_issues_url.description: URL to beginner-friendly issues for this project, or null if unavailable.

stars.description: Star/favorite count (e.g. GitHub stars), or null if unavailable.

contributions.description: Contribution opportunities for this project. Omitted when empty.

funding_channel.title: FundingChannel
funding_channel.description: A funding or donation channel for an upstream project.

platform.description: The funding platform name (e.g. GitHub Sponsors, Open Collective, Patreon).

url.description: URL to the project's funding page on this platform.

contribution_opportunity.title: ContributionOpportunity
contribution_opportunity.description: A concrete opportunity to contribute to an upstream project.

url.description: URL the user can visit to act on this opportunity.

package.title: InstalledPackage
package.description: A single installed package with its metadata and license information.

name.description: The name of the installed package.

version.description: The version string of the installed package.

description.description: A short description of the package, or null if unavailable.

url.description: The upstream URL of the package, or null if unavailable.

source.description: The package manager source that provides this package.

licenses.description: List of license identifiers associated with the package.
